Text: Thank you! Waiting all day! and thank you for B&R #10 too.
Hearing soooooo many things about Batman #10. Looks like this will be the book of the month! :)
If only I could just Hug you thru the screen :)
Wow, this new 52 truly is a return to pre-crisis continuity. The return of Thomas Wayne Jr?. I hate to say it but i'm sensing another Crisis 10 years or so down the line.

not to mention..when they redid owlman as coming from antimatter universe..he was thomas wayne jr, bruces brother. I thought the whole point of this new 52 was for new ideas, not to rehash old ones? course should have seen this coming with the whole OWL concept.
^ Do you know anyone called Znerol83 ?
lol, thats me. Demonoid huh? Just wanted to put my comment up on both sites for those who don't use both of these.
Getting the whole Night of the Owls saga on another download according to the Checklist in the booklet. They say #10 answers many questions. Do I need to get #1-#8? Never read them yet.
